name: Silent Night (itch) (Leoreth)
description:
After so many years of discord, Claire and Elene are finally reunited. As they're happily reminiscing about the past, something terrible happens. Will they be able to face what awaits them? Only your choices can forge their fate.

Silent Night is a small textual based and narrative game with 3 different endings. Each choice you make has an impact on your game, so choose carefully!
